name: test_function
description: Please update description - If this alert fires then it means so-and-so and check so-and-so for irregularities
yaml:
detectionName: test_function
description: Please update description - If this alert fires then it means so-and-so and check so-and-so for irregularities
metric: test_metric
active: true
dataset: test_collection
type: COMPOSITE_ALERT
dimensionExploration:
  dimensions:
  - platform
filters:
  platform:
  - desktop
  - tablet
rules:
- detection:
  - name: detection_rule1
    type: PERCENTAGE_RULE
    params:
      percentageChange: 0.05
      pattern: DOWN
